text: Davutoğlu is a Turkish surname. Its literal meaning is "son of Davut", which is similar to that of the Bosnian surname Dautović and the Albanian family name Dauti. Notable people with the name include: *Ahmet Davutoğlu (born 1959), Turkish politician *Ali Davutoğlu (born 1955), Turkish ambassador to Tanzania *Burak Davutoğlu (born 1970), Turkish actor *Sare Davutoğlu (born 1961), Turkish physician and wife of the former Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoğlu ==References== Category:Turkish-language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Davutoğlu (surname)
